text: Ram Gopal may refer to: * Ram Gopal (author) (born 1925), Indian writer and historian * Ram Gopal Varma (born 1962), Indian screenwriter, film director/producer * Ram Gopal (dancer) (1912–2003), Bangalore-born British dancer * Ram Gopal Bajaj (born 1940), National School of Drama director * Ram Gopal Yadav (born 1946), Indian politician ==See also== * Ram Gopal Varma Ke Sholay, 2007 Indian film
title: Ram Gopal
